summary: Completed comprehensive testing of redesigned agent dashboard for 24gameapi.com. All backend APIs (100% success rate) and most frontend features working correctly. Agent login, dark sidebar navigation, mobile responsiveness, and status dropdowns all functional.

integration_issues.issue: Sidebar toggle button (chevron) not easily detectable via automated testing

passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Agent login with black/white theme working perfectly
Agent dashboard loads with dark sidebar (rgb(17, 17, 17))
Sidebar navigation to All Chats view working
Sidebar navigation to Projects view working
Sidebar navigation to Orders view working
Sidebar navigation to Agents view working
Sidebar navigation to Analytics view working
Sidebar navigation to Settings (General) view working
Sidebar navigation to Notifications view working
Chat card display with status dropdowns (18 dropdowns found)
Status dropdown functionality with 7 options each
Mobile responsive layout confirmed - sidebar hidden on mobile
Mobile bottom navigation with 5 items working
WebSocket availability confirmed for real-time updates
Chat cards showing proper status indicators (56 status indicators found)
Orders view displaying properly with search functionality
